laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal level of 9.5 mg/dL (reference range: 8.6 - 10.3 mg/dL).
Significantly elevated level of 199 pg/mL (reference range: 15 - 65).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Methylation Analysis of Exon A/B DMR
laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1: normal methylation at 45% (normal > 43%); Patient 2: reduced methylation at 34% (normal > 43%).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1 showed normal methylation (57%) at exon A/B, while Patient 2 showed a decrease to 32% at exon A/B.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Calcium, Phosphorus, and Intact PTH Level
laboratory_examinations.findings: PTH increased to 218 pg/mL; calcium 8.8 mg/dL; phosphorus 7.6 mg/dL.
